thread.title: Wish Teresa Gagne a ‘Happy Birthday’ as she celebrates 105 years
thread.title_full: Wish Teresa Gagne a ‘Happy Birthday’ as she celebrates 105 years

author: Sierra Whaley
title: Wish Teresa Gagne a ‘Happy Birthday’ as she celebrates 105 years
text: Wish Teresa Gagne a ‘Happy Birthday’ as she celebrates 105 years WATERVILLE, Maine (WABI) - In the year 1919, a lot of historical moments happened. On April 18, 1919, a special woman was born. Teresa Gagne is celebrating a huge milestone, her 105th birthday. Some lunch plans were in store with her family and then they had a party at her Waterville home. The Brunswick native grew up with nine sisters and three brothers. She walked from home to school every single day, two miles there and two miles back. Her hard work and curiosity led her to different adventures and in 1942 she sealed the deal with someone special. “I married a guy from Waterville, and we stayed in Brunswick for two years and then he couldn’t find any work over there so we moved over here,” said Gagne. They made Waterville their home and raised their three kids. Her husband was in the service, and she had a very demanding job herself, she was a weaver and started that career when she was 18 years old. She retired when she was 60. During her upbringing, finding work as a woman was difficult. “There wasn’t much work for women you know, to pick out if you weren’t educated,” said Gagne. “Yeah, I only went to grammar school.” That didn’t stop her from working hard and making a great career out of it which helped provide for her family. So, what is her secret? She said it’s staying active and staying in good health and of course having some fun here and there. “I love to gamble,” said Gagne laughingly. With all that she’s seen in this world, and all that she’s done, keeping her family and friends close are the key to her smile. Happy Birthday Teresa from WABI TV! Copyright 2024 WABI. All rights reserved.
